mapper.update: update article set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, nice = #{nice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scan = #{scan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select article_id, category_id, title, user_id, post_time, `status`, nice, scan, content from article where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select article_id, category_id, title, user_id, post_time, `status`, nice, scan, content from article
